_examples._note: These are example knowledge categories. Copy the structure to 'categories' and customize.

category_id.description: Description of what this category covers

example_world_history.description: Major historical events and eras in this world

depths.0: The Great War happened 100 years ago. The kingdom has been at peace since.
depths.1: The Great War was between the Northern Alliance and Southern Kingdoms. It ended with the Treaty of Silverbrook.
depths.2: The war began over control of the Silverbrook mines. King Aldric III led the Northern forces. The treaty ceded mining rights but preserved borders.
depths.3: General Thorne Blackwood committed atrocities at the Siege of Millhaven that official histories omit. Some veterans still remember.

example_local_gossip.description: Rumors, scandals, and social dynamics in the local area

depths.0: The mayor is well-liked. The tavern serves good ale.
depths.1: The mayor's son has been sneaking out at night. The blacksmith and baker are feuding over land.
depths.2: The mayor's son is meeting someone at the old mill. The blacksmith claims the baker's grandfather stole land during the flood.
depths.3: The mayor's son is involved with a merchant's daughter - scandalous given his arranged engagement to the duke's niece.

example_trade_knowledge.description: Economic information, prices, and merchant networks

depths.0: Goods can be bought and sold at the market.
depths.1: Prices fluctuate seasonally. Iron is expensive due to mine closures.
depths.2: The Merchant Guild controls most trade routes. Independent traders pay fees or risk 'accidents'.
depths.3: Guild Master Vance has a secret deal with Northern smugglers. The mine closures were engineered to drive up prices.

example_magic_lore.description: Knowledge about magic systems, spells, and practitioners

depths.0: Magic exists. Wizards live in towers. Don't anger them.
depths.1: Magic is divided into elemental schools: fire, water, earth, air. The Academy trains practitioners.
depths.2: True power comes from combining schools. The Archmage can wield all four. Blood magic is forbidden.
depths.3: The ban on blood magic hides the truth: it's not inherently evil, but was used to create the undying king centuries ago.
